key_strengths: Good approach speed, showing aggression towards the ball.
Solid knee extension on the striking leg, indicating potential for power.

areas_for_improvement.issue: Critical: Torso Lean (leaning back too much)
instructions: Sit on a chair with your plant foot flat on the ground.
Practice swinging your kicking leg while keeping your chest hovering over your knee.
Focus on the feeling of 'covering' the ball with your sternum.

areas_for_improvement.issue: Critical: Plant Foot Placement (foot is too far behind the ball)
instructions: Place two cones 15cm apart (the 'gate') next to a stationary ball.
Run up and practice landing your plant foot exactly between the cones.
Do not kick the ball; just focus on the landing spot. Repeat 20 times.
Stand on your plant leg and swing your kicking leg.
Force your kicking leg to land across your body, past your plant leg.
This ensures full hip rotation through the imaginary ball.

technical_data.Conclusion_MK: Двете критични грешки се во поставувањето на торзото и стајната нога, што драстично ја намалува прецизноста и моќта на ударот.

coaching_tips.en: Great approach speed! However, we noticed two critical errors. Your torso is leaning back at 118 degrees (Target: 95), which causes the ball to fly high. Also, your plant foot is 12 cm behind the ball, sacrificing power. **Correction:** Lean your torso slightly over the ball and position your plant foot right next to the ball to maximize accuracy and force.
coaching_tips.mk: Твојот залет е одличен! Сепак, забележавме две критични грешки. Твоето торзо е навалено наназад на 118 степени (Цел: 95°), што предизвикува топката да оди високо. Исто така, твојата стајна нога е 12 cm поназад од топката, што ја намалува силата. **Корекција:** Наведни го торзото малку над топката и постави ја стајната нога веднаш до топката за да ја зголемиш прецизноста и силата.
coaching_tips.es: ¡Excelente velocidad de aproximación! Sin embargo, notamos dos errores críticos. Tu torso se inclina hacia atrás a 118 grados (Objetivo: 95°), lo que hace que el balón se eleve demasiado. Además, tu pie de apoyo está 12 cm detrás del balón, sacrificando potencia. **Corrección:** Inclina el torso ligeramente sobre el balón y coloca el pie de apoyo justo al lado del balón para maximizar la precisión y la fuerza.
